intro: Sarcoglyphis brevilabia, commonly known as the narrow-lipped sarcoglyphis, is a species of flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of southern Africa. Sarcoglyphis brevilabia is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes cultivated in gardens with well-drained soil and full sun.
